name: Duck Wars: Friday The Duckteenth
description:
On Halloween’s stormy night, the lake needs a hero. A flock of geese is set to invade it at midnight and only you can defeat them!

Explore the entire Halloween-themed neighborhood, conquer houses by trick-or-treating, and gather ammunition before midnight to protect Central Lake from its invasion threat in the spookiest and most interactive game of the Duck Wars series: Duck Wars - Friday the Duckteenth!

More to come:

  • A variety of unlockable and buyable ducks to play as.
  • Additional game modes including two-player mode.
  • More weapons, traps and ammunition to buy using collected candy.

www.LakeDeep.org
